content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully placed on the map. Repeated attempts to craft and position a Lab at (0.5, 2.5)—which is intended to supply Automation Science Packs for research—were unsuccessful. Although the process referenced existing processing facilities (a furnace at (5.0, 5.0) for iron conversion and a furnace at (–27.0, –60.0) for copper conversion), no new structure has been constructed.

ERROR TIPS
• API Usage Issues:
 – When calling get_entities, ensure that only the parameters accepted by its signature are used. Avoid including unsupported keywords (such as ‘radius’) or passing an incorrect number of positional arguments.

• Lab Crafting and Placement:
 – Verify that a Lab item is available in the inventory before attempting to place it at (0.5, 2.5).
 – Confirm that all sub-ingredients required for Lab production (for example, iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) are sufficiently available.
 – Prevent errors when processing retrieved entities by using proper fallback logic (e.g., converting a None return into an empty list).

• Resource Management:
 – Ensure that resource conversion processes have adequate inputs (such as ore, fuel, and intermediary products) so that dependent recipes—like Lab crafting—can be supported without shortages.
